meanings.definition: The fashionable set of celebrities and socialites.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the glitterati arrived in their fancy cars.
meanings.sent2: The glitterati were all over the red carpet at the movie premiere.
meanings.sent3: The glitterati's outfits sparkled brighter than the disco ball.
meanings.sent4: She felt like part of the glitterati when she got invited to the exclusive event.
meanings.sent5: The glitterati's presence lit up the room with elegance and charm.

meanings.definition: A group of glamorous and influential people.
meanings.sent1: The glitterati gathered at the charity gala to support a good cause.
meanings.sent2: In the world of fashion, the glitterati's opinions hold a lot of weight.
meanings.sent3: Even the pigeons in the park seemed to admire the glitterati's style.
meanings.sent4: The glitterati's influence shone through in every aspect of the event.
meanings.sent5: Being in the presence of the glitterati felt like being in a fairy tale.
